controls.title: Account Management

controls.title: Access Enforcement
controls.description: Enforce approved authorizations for logical access to AWS FIS resources

implementation.description: Configure IAM service roles with specific permissions for FIS experiments, implement resource-based policies for target resources

controls.description: Employ the principle of least privilege for FIS experiment permissions

implementation.description: Create minimal IAM policies for FIS service roles, restrict actions to only required AWS services and resources

controls.description: Identify the types of events to be logged related to FIS experiments

implementation.description: Enable CloudTrail logging for FIS API calls, configure CloudWatch for experiment monitoring and logging

controls.title: Boundary Protection
controls.description: Monitor and control communications at external boundaries and key internal boundaries

implementation.description: Implement VPC endpoints for FIS when applicable, ensure network segmentation for experiment targets

controls.description: Conduct backups of system-level information before running destructive FIS experiments

implementation.description: Implement automated backup strategies for target resources before experiment execution

controls.title: Vulnerability Scanning

implementation.description: Use AWS Inspector and other vulnerability scanning tools on FIS target resources

controls.title: System Monitoring
controls.description: Monitor FIS experiments and detect unauthorized activities

implementation.description: Configure CloudWatch alarms for FIS experiment status, implement automated monitoring for experiment impacts

controls.title: Identity and Access Management Policy and Procedures
controls.description: Establish comprehensive IAM policies for FIS service access and experiment execution

implementation.description: Define and implement IAM policies specifically for FIS experiment creators and executors with appropriate boundaries

controls.title: User ID Credentials
controls.description: Ensure unique identification and authentication for all FIS users

implementation.description: Implement MFA for all users accessing FIS, use federated authentication where possible

controls.title: Business Continuity Testing
controls.description: Use FIS experiments to validate business continuity and disaster recovery procedures

implementation.description: Design FIS experiments that test recovery procedures and business continuity plans

controls.title: Data Classification
controls.description: Classify data that may be affected by FIS experiments

implementation.description: Implement data classification tags and policies for resources targeted by FIS experiments

controls.title: Threat and Vulnerability Management
controls.description: Manage threats and vulnerabilities that could be exposed through chaos engineering

implementation.description: Integrate vulnerability management processes with FIS experiment planning and execution

controls.title: CloudTrail should be enabled and configured with at least one multi-Region trail that includes read and write management events and all data events
controls.description: Ensure all FIS API activities are logged across regions

implementation.description: Enable CloudTrail with multi-region trail to capture all FIS service API calls and experiment activities

controls.title: IAM policies should not allow full administrative privileges
controls.description: Prevent overly permissive IAM policies for FIS service roles

implementation.description: Create specific IAM policies for FIS with only required permissions, avoid using AdministratorAccess policy

controls.title: IAM users should not have IAM policies attached
controls.description: Use IAM groups and roles instead of direct policy attachment for FIS access

implementation.description: Attach FIS permissions to IAM groups or roles rather than directly to users

controls.title: IAM root user access key should not exist
controls.description: Ensure root account access keys are not used for FIS operations

implementation.description: Use IAM users or roles for FIS access, never use root account credentials

controls.title: CloudWatch log groups should be retained for at least 1 year
controls.description: Maintain adequate retention for FIS experiment logs

implementation.description: Configure CloudWatch log groups for FIS experiments with minimum 365-day retention period

controls.title: IAM users' access keys should be rotated every 90 days or less
controls.description: Regularly rotate access keys used for programmatic FIS access

implementation.description: Implement automated access key rotation for any programmatic access to FIS services

controls.title: FIS experiments should have stop conditions configured
controls.description: Ensure all FIS experiments have appropriate stop conditions to prevent uncontrolled failures

implementation.description: Configure CloudWatch alarms as stop conditions for all FIS experiments to automatically halt on critical thresholds

controls.title: FIS experiments should target non-production environments first
controls.description: Validate experiments in non-production before running in production

implementation.description: Implement a testing workflow that requires successful non-production validation before production experiments

controls.title: FIS service roles should follow least privilege principle
controls.description: Limit FIS service role permissions to only required actions and resources

implementation.description: Create granular IAM policies for FIS service roles with specific resource ARNs and minimal required actions

controls.title: FIS experiments should be tagged appropriately
controls.description: Use consistent tagging for FIS experiments to enable proper governance and cost tracking

implementation.description: Implement standardized tagging strategy for FIS experiments including owner, environment, and cost center tags

cost.name: AWS FIS Cost Optimization Best Practices

controls.title: Use experiment templates to avoid redundant configurations

implementation.description: Develop standardized FIS experiment templates using Infrastructure as Code for common chaos engineering scenarios

controls.title: Implement proper experiment scheduling

controls.title: Clean up temporary resources created during experiments
controls.description: Ensure temporary resources created during experiments are properly cleaned up to avoid ongoing costs

implementation.description: Implement automated cleanup procedures using Lambda functions or other automation tools to remove temporary resources post-experiment

controls.title: Implement cost tracking and budgets for chaos engineering activities
controls.description: Track costs associated with FIS experiments and set appropriate budgets and alerts

implementation.description: Use AWS Cost Explorer and Budget alerts with appropriate tags to monitor and control FIS-related spending

controls.title: Monitor and optimize experiment duration
controls.description: Set appropriate experiment durations to balance learning objectives with cost efficiency

implementation.description: Define optimal experiment durations based on learning objectives and configure stop conditions to prevent excessive runtime

controls.title: Implement experiment result analysis automation
controls.description: Automate analysis of experiment results to reduce manual effort and improve efficiency

implementation.description: Deploy automated dashboards and analysis tools to process FIS experiment results and generate actionable insights

controls.title: Use appropriate IAM roles and policies
controls.description: Optimize IAM role usage to avoid unnecessary permissions and associated management overhead
